text: Balo -- ''tini ksamatasila tomadera upare sasti aropa karate tomadera upara theke athaba tomadera payera nice theke, athaba tomadera disahara karate parena daladali kariye, ara tomadera ekadalake bhoga karate parena an'ya dalera nipirana.â€™â€™ Dekho, kirupe amara nirdesasamuha nanabhabe barnana kari yena tara bujhate pare
